item.description: Thank you Ted! We're really excited to have you on the team on as well. We know you will have a huge impact. Truly appreciate the post and the good words.

item.description: Again, my congratulations to you! I'm sure this is a big move with a big impact on your career because you really sound so excited about it!<br />
